verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron,

“\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: \w Instruct|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w* red \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w defect|strong="H8549"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w placed|strong="H3947"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3548"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H7819"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

Eleazar \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* some \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w its|strong="H3947"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* finger \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*.

Then \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w* \w must|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*. \w Its|strong="H5921"\w* \w hide|strong="H5785"\w*, \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w*, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* cedar \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, hyssop, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* wool \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* onto \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w must|strong="H4264"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w* \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w after|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* enter \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w but|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H1320"\w* ceremonially \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H1320"\w* who \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* heifer must also \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w* \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* too \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H1320"\w* ceremonially \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* gather \w up|strong="H3240"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* ashes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* store \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*. \w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w kept|strong="H4931"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* preparing \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w purification|strong="H2403"\w*; \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w purification|strong="H2403"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8432"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1616"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w gathered|strong="H1481"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* ashes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* clothes, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* ceremonially \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*. \w This|strong="H8432"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w* residing \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w*.

\w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* water \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; \w then|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

\w Anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w human|strong="H5315"\w* \w corpse|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* fails \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w defiles|strong="H2930"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w remains|strong="H5750"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* purification \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* person \w dies|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tent: \w Everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* enters \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tent \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* already \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tent \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3627"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w container|strong="H3627"\w* without \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lid \w fastened|strong="H6616"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w Anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w someone|strong="H4191"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w been|strong="H2930"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* natural causes, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* human \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w purification|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* person, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* some \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8316"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jar|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w pour|strong="H5414"\w* \w fresh|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w some|strong="H8033"\w* hyssop, \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tent, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furnishings|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w also|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* man \w who|strong="H2889"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w ceremonially|strong="H2931"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* person \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* purifies \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* person \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H7992"\w* being \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* must \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* purification \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H2930"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2708"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w people|strong="H6153"\w*: \w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* who \w sprinkles|strong="H5137"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* purification must \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* clothes, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* whoever \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* purification \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w Anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w become|strong="H2930"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w it|strong="H2930"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.”
